alert.note: Alert for Dinwiddie; Prince George; Sussex (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 12:20AM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Prince George, north central Sussex and east central Dinwiddie Counties and the southeastern City of Petersburg through 100 AM EDT... At 1219 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Dinwiddie, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Carson around 1235 AM EDT. Disputanta around 1255 AM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include New Bohemia, Petersburg Airport, Five Forks, Newville, Richard Bland College, Burgess, Templeton, Reams, Prince George Golf and Wharfs Store. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
